Text: the movie with the most fucked up scenes ive seen ever! little known cult classic!! highly recommend.

I must agree with rorschach43, if you like weird, fucked-up, gory and sicko films, this one takes the cake. It came out in 1987 and is almost impossible to find on video. I actually went out and bought a copy several years ago, second hand. It's right up there with "Blood Sucking Freaks." Towards the end of the movie is a crazy scene where bums are playing "salugee" (aka "keep away") with someone's severed penis. Don't believe me, check out all the rave reviews over at IMDB:

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0094057

Trivia: This is the first film to use a "steadicam."

Hum... Is it this film where they drink the booze and melt in different colors? Also... Aren't there a scene where they ripp off the dick from a guy and start to throw it in between each others letting the dickless guy chase it?

Think I have seen this one for many years ago...

Please seed this!!  Just saw it today, one of the best cult movies I've ever seen.
Must  Torrent  It!
